Articles.Content: So, I'm not sure which mod may have done this, but several parts no longer have options for directional control. For example I cannot assign pitch raw or roll controls to various flaps wings or tail pieces, they are now missing. These are vanilla parts by the way. To my knowledge I haven't added any mod that should directly affect these parts. Any thoughts?
Make sure you enable advanced tweakables in the options menu, otherwise some functions won't display.
AH! I didn't think of that, I'm trying a clean install now since I think some mods conflicted with some other parts. Once I get everything back installed, I will update.
